name: Airwolf
description: The game of the TV show is viewed from the side and puts you in command of an attack helicopter. Your task is to rescue 5 scientists from an underground lair by destroying its layer of protection and then getting to the core.  Moving onto a screen at a time you must shoot out anything and everything in your path, including lots of regenerating static targets. Realistic gravity takes effect, so you can't simply hover in a set position.
alsoFor: Amstrad CPC, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, Enterprise, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
